name: Lava land (Heavy WIP)
description:
Controls: Right arrow to go right, left arrow to go left, down arrow to drop down, up arrow to jump. Press the up arrow again to double jump

If you want to play again, press F5

College tutorial project. Heavy WIP. This game has a maze like setting, your goal is to get to the end. coins and such collectibles are optional. Be aware of ending paths. There is a little square below the animated guy, that is your hitbox.

Bugs: Title screen does not work

Coin counter no longer appears
